PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE 
	{ 	?s dcat:theme ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?s dcat:theme ?uri }
WHERE
	{ 	?s dcat:theme ?o .
		FILTER ( isLiteral(?o) && STRSTARTS(?o, "http"))
		BIND ( URI(?o) as ?uri)
	}
